Description:
Refurbished Home on a Large Block
Updated only a couple of years ago, the future occupants of this immaculately presented family home can rest easy with peace of mind that not a single job needs tending to the moment that they call this place home. Cooks of any level will appreciate the spacious Caesar stone kitchen with stainless steel upright stove & adjoining family/meals area, while the huge backyard filled with fruit trees, plus under cover BBQ area & 2 powered bungalows is qualified to entertain both adults and kids. Other engaging features include a sizable formal lounge, 3 bedrooms, including master bedroom with WIR & ensuite, central bathroom, evaporative cooling and 2 separate driveways providing off street parking for up to 6 cars. Kinder, Primary school and buses are just up the road and Clayton Central shops, eateries, train station & Monash Medical Centre just a short drive away.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Description:
Vendor Must Sell! Plans & Permits Approved For 4 Townhouses!
Builders and Developers take a look at this great opportunity that's ready to go!
There are Approved plans and permits for 4 townhouses, 2 with street frontage, ready to be built on this massive 877sqm (approximately) of land size. Close proximity to the Westall Train Station, local shopping strip, Clayton Train Station, and only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
With high re-sale values in the area, all the hard work has been done, ready for you to start developing fantastic development!
Vendor committed elsewhere! Must sell property!

Comprising of 3 bedrooms, a bright central bathroom, separate kitchen/meals area, living room, ducted heating, air-conditioning, and a single lock-up garage, and 593sqm of land makes this property perfect for future development (STCA).
Live in, rent out, or develop the choice is yours.

Description:
Beautifully Maintained Residence! Walk to Clayton Shopping Central & Train Station!
This fantastic three bedroom brick veneer residence is in close proximity to Clayton Central shopping district, Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library) Monash Medical Centre and only few a minutes walk to the bus stop which will take you to Monash University or Chadstone Shopping Centre.
Featuring: 3 large bedrooms with built-in-robes and master with walk-in-robe, modern kitchen with meals area open to timber decking at rear, central ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, spacious tiled bathroom, separate laundry area and second toilet, single lock-up garage with workshop space and one carport, spacious private courtyard and much, much more!
Fantastic decking area and private open space, perfect for entertaining family and friends!
Be quick to inspect and secure this fantastic property, one of the best residences in the area!

Description:
First Home? First Choice
Are you one of the thousands of people looking for that elusive first home? The one you don't have to spend mega bucks on or apologies to your friends for the unfinished renovations? Well your search could well be over! Set at the top of a quiet court with enough yard for kids, dogs or both, this well presented home offers you polished floorboards in the open living room flowing through to the dining area and updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 3 good-sized bedrooms all with build in robes, renovated bathroom, study/sunroom and covered alfresco area, double garage, workshop, BBQ/kitchenette and large shed out the back. There's also a gas heating, two split-system air-conditioners and plenty of extra parking, plus you can walk to a newly upgraded Heatherton Park & bus stop around the corner, and be within close proximity to schools, shopping centre, train station and Freeway.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Peaceful Lifestyle!
A once in a lifetime opportunity arises to capture this fully renovated home and just recently updated, this stunning example of stylish living combined with no maintenance is exactly what you are looking for!
With an excellent location and spacious living area, this magnificent 2 bedroom unit will be the envy of all your friends. Situated within close proximity to Clayton Central shopping district, Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library) Monash Medical Centre and only a minute walk to bus stop which will take you to Monash University. what more could you ask for?
Featuring; polished timber floors, modern 2-pak kitchen, glass splash-backs, modern bathrooms & toilet, huge front and back yard and a new single lock up carport.

Description:
INSPECTION A MUST
Looking for a home to raise a family, then this quality built one owner home could be it, located on a quiet street and close to schools, shopping centres and a major road link with the Eastern suburbs makes it a sort after area.
The home comprises of an updated timber kitchen with gas appliances and meals area, formal dining and living room with feature wall and quality carpet, an extended family room with separate entrance and toilet make it ideal for a home office or work room. With air-conditioning, ducted heating and ceiling fans in most rooms the home is comfortable in all seasons. As well, three good sized bedrooms, master with semi-ensuite, separate toilet bathroom with spa bath and separate shower make it a family friendly home.
Outside on the tidy 538sqm (approx) block there are paved pathways, a covered area to sit and relax that can double as secured parking to supplement the garage, plus an expansive drive for additional parking space. Or relax on the front porch in the shade of a large palm tree and watch the sunset on balmy summer evenings.
Features:
Ducted Heating
Air-conditioning to main rooms
Ceiling fans in most rooms
Modern timber kitchen with gas appliances
Side by side garage
Additional paved parking area
Low maintenance yard

Description:
On Almost 800m2 Corner Block!
Situated in a leafy street, close to Grange Reserve, Westall Tennis Club and walking distance to local primary and secondary schools is this beautiful corner block.
The lucky buyer will have a commanding view over the parklands once the house is built. Potential also for multi unit site (STCA), with a wonderful and inviting streetscape.
Only minutes to Springvale Central and walking distance to Westall Station. Perfect site for those looking for a beautiful block to build their dream home on.Landsize 15.78m X 50m, 789m2 approx.
Property features include:
*Dual driveway access - one on Osbourne Avenue & one on Worsley Avenue.
Potential Multi Unit Site (STCA)
* Site 90% cleared, save $$thousands on demolition costs

Description:
UNDER OFFER $370,000
The convenient position is just a brilliant starting point for this fantastic 3 bedrooms townhouse within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, an array of shops, local schools, public transportation, Monash Medical Centre and direct buses which lead you to Monash University, what more could you ask?
Sophisticated and stylish only begin to describe this exquisite near new young brick townhouse. Flawless in design and immaculately presented, built with superior finishing's, this pleasant townhouse will unquestionably draw your attention.
Comprising: 3 large bedrooms (largest bedroom size being 16sqm approx.), Master bedroom with a full ensuite, a separate kitchen/meal area upstairs with quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone bench tops, 2 air conditioning split systems, a secure underground car parking with remote controlled gate access.
Currently tenanted with a massive $1993 per month rental (on a monthly tenancy), continue renting out property or moved right in.

Description:
Spacious Unit - Priced to Sell
Low body corporate fees and No electricity bills! Big in size and walking distance to train and bus. This is your chance to break into the thriving Clayton South property market and purchase an affordable and solid investment or home.
This fantastic updated residence comprises of 2 large bedrooms, spacious living room, kitchen with gas appliances and adjoining meals area, separate laundry and huge courtyard with shed.
Also included are security roller shutters to all main windows, single lock-up garage, and the premium German solar panel system, that generates enough power to cover the electricity bills and further pay you a reasonable income every year.
With easy access to Westall Train Station, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping Centre, Monash University and public transport at your door step, make no mistake that properties with this much value are seldom found.

Description:
AMAZING BRAND NEW STAND ALONE 4 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE IN PRIME LOCATION!
Fantastic opportunity arises for the first home buyer or investor looking for a large 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, brick veneer residence in one of Clayton South's most popular streets.
Situated within a short distance to Westall Train Station, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping Centre and minutes away to the new IKEA, the location is highly sought after with phenomenal growth potential!
Featuring own street access frontage with private front yard, high ceilings throughout, 4 large bedrooms of which master bedroom with walk-in-robes and ensuite, 2 other bedroom with built-in-robes, solid timber flooring, premium modern kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, gas cooking appliances, dishwasher, gas hot water system, 2 splits systems, single lock-up garage, 1 extra car space, private courtyard and too many features to list!
Eligible first home buyers who qualify for the brand new first home owner's grant of up to $7,000 and 30% stamp duty saving (applicable settlement after 1 January 2013)
Be first to inspect to ensure you capture this fantastic opportunity before it's sold!

Description:
Unbeatable Value for Starters
A solid home with big potential. Set in a family friendly neighbourhood close to shops, schools, parks and transport. An unrivalled opportunity for first home buyers and young families wanting to purchase an affordable 3 bedroom brick veneer residence in and among the heart of Clayton South.
Consisting of 3 very good sized bedrooms - 2 with robes, a central bathroom, quality timber kitchen, adjoining dining/meals area, followed by a light filled and comfortable living quarters.
Featuring low maintenance timber floorboards and slate tiles throughout, air conditioning, gas ducted heating to all main rooms, and adequate space outside - perfect for kids or entertaining. Also included is a lock up carport with a further space for boat or caravan.
One of the best value homes within 20kms (approx.) of the CBD. Only requiring a fresh coat of paint and some TLC, this could be the opportunity you have been waiting for.
Insights: 3 Narrumburn Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.
